author: Neal Jacob
comment: It would really be nice if the app started by displaying the event closest to the current time. I don't really need to see an event that happened yesterday. It needs to auto-refresh.  Also, it needs the option of turning off the birthday calendar.  ** I changed this from 3 to 4-stars because the developer is very responsive to email. We just had an email conversation less than five minutes after I posted my review. :)

reply.author: QHutch
reply.content: It does auto refresh every 15 minutes. If an old event is shown in the middle position when opening the app it may be because it isn't finished, if it actually is finished then it's a bug (sorry about that)

author: Andrew Griffiths
comment: So in principle this app is good, but in practice I can't see my events. The date should be above the items so they can take the full width, and the font needs to be smaller - half the screen is white at the moment. Be nice to have a more material icon too... I'd pay then!!
title: Works but not great

author: Dennis Wu
comment: Gives you the option for which account calenders to display which is working flawlessly. Colour coding is awesome too, miles better than that stock agenda app. Only complaint is that I cannot get rid of the birthdays, there is no option to turn that off...
title: Awesome except for one thing

author: Paulo Gatchalian
comment: Pretty good, but:  1. too much white space in between the detailed events screen makes you think there are no more next events. Maybe you can trim it down? 2. colors deviate from google scheme, which is ok, but kind of off-putting when most wear apps follow a similar color palate. 3. event names are truncated too short in main screen making it almost useless and have to swipe to the left one more time to see what your events are.

author: Rebekah S
comment: Nice, but not good enough.  For one, NEEDS the option for a smaller font - the agenda items are horribly truncated because of the limited space.  For two, when I open the app it goes to the first event from two days ago. It's nice to see past events, but why doesn't it start centered on the next upcoming event, instead of making me scroll down to see what's up for today??  Looking for a better option unless/until this gets fixed.

reply.author: QHutch
reply.content: The standard behavior is to start centered on the next event, maybe you have an event that last more than one day and isn't finished. I cannot make fonts smaller or I'll loose the android wear app label.

title: Why does it start 2 days ago?

author: markhwhite
comment: I would have given it a 5 but I had to turn off the ads and get a guilt message from the developer because every time I changed screens a popup would come up that I had to dismiss.  I could have lived with the banner ads.
title: Does what it's supposed to perfectly

author: Craig Ueltzen
comment: Works great on an Asus Zen Watch. It's a bit confusing at first, but after the first sync and loading, it becomes more clear. Tap the refresh arrow at the top, if needed. Items appear below, swipe up to see them all. Left swipe to see details, and again, swipe up to see them all. It's simple, and all details are seen. Add something to your calendar, and it's there when you open the app on the watch. It works well, 'nuf said.

author: Matthew Raupp
comment: The agenda is off by one day.  It shows an all day event on the day before the day it is on my calendar.  For example, I work all day tomorrow but it shows it on today's agenda.
title: Agenda doesn't line up correctly with the day

author: Adam Young
comment: Crashes on Nexus 6P. Not sure why but I was unable to get the app to start up. Hopefully this may be fixed in the future.

reply.author: QHutch
reply.content: I use it on a daily basis on my Nexus 6P and it never crashed, can you send me a mail at quentin.menini+play@gmail.com to explain your problem more in details ?

author: Irina Albu
comment: The agenda wear is a neat application, but i have one major issue: after the initial sync, the agenda won't synchronise any new events on the smartwatch. The events show up on my phone, but they never appear on the smartwatch. I have an Asus Zenwatch 2
title: Doesn't sync on smartwatch

author: Jamie MacFarlane
comment: This is a great replacement for the rubbish agenda app that comes on Google wear. Google could learn from this app and as I've not found a decent calendar app. This will do for now.
title: A great replacement

author: Stephen Crook
comment: Good app but my chosen calendar colour is a boring brown. Can you allow us to choose a colour or make them more vibrant? I would give it 5* then.
title: I like it..

author: Michael Burrows
comment: This works extremely well and much better than the stock one but can only give it 3 stars as the battery runs out in less than my normal day so had to uninstall it. 5 stars if that can be fixed
title: Good but drains battery

author: Amy Christian
comment: I AM LITERALLY UNABLE to try anything on this app without adds. I have done nothing in this app but dismiss adds. It may be a virus or. I've actually seen flashes of a calendar that looks like my schedule between adds, there just isn't enough time between adds for me to interact with the app at all.
title: Seriously?

author: Matthew Smith
comment: An all day event on 2/18/16 shows on this agenda app on 2/17/16; very confusing. Used this app with a first gen Moto 360. By default, the app shows ads; you can turn ads off in the settings.

reply.author: QHutch
reply.content: You said that this is a paid app but it's wrong, the app has always been free

title: Does ok. Needs improvement.

author: Lee McGuire
comment: Would be a perfect app if it wasn't draining my battery constantly in the background
title: Battery drain

author: Abgr Xenda
comment: Also it is hard to scroll down to reach to the end, but couldn't see more than 10 days
title: Cannot see future dates

author: Nrseife S
comment: Nice app. However, appointments do not seem to trigger a vibration on my SW3....is this enabled? If so, what do I need to do to turn this feature on?

reply.author: QHutch
reply.content: This feature doesn't exist because the original agenda app from the phone already triggers vibrations if it's enabled, but if you want I will work on a feature like this (but you'll have to be patient as my job and the university take a lot of time)

author: Chris Reid
comment: Great little agenda app. You can remove the ads on your phone but you are not supporting the developer.
title: Nice agenda app

author: Jacob Bondt
comment: Family Birthday displaying wrong all displaying a day a head.Does not show a way I can change them,utterly useless.
title: Sony sw3/nexus 5

author: Mark Ballance
comment: Love the style and simplicity but the date is often missing on the left so don't know what date the appointments are for until I click/open them. Please fix then its a 5*

author: Luca Grimaldi
comment: It can be even more perfect if you would give the possibility to show imediately the location on the event without swiping on the left to have extra details!
title: It's perfect!

author: Rose Rodent
comment: Frequently stops working "Unfortunately agenda wear has stopped" and no way to send error reports.

author: Martin Wong
comment: Somehow one of my calendars snc from Google is not shown in selection  list,  so I cannot untick from the list.  The calendar is displayed in agenda wear by default. grateful if you can fix.
title: Calendar not shown

author: Lex Leonard
comment: Works, but it's laggy and doesn't use cards effectively.

author: Steve Rafters
comment: Crap doesn't work,  garbage, don't d/l
title: Garbage - hate it

author: Ulf Östling
comment: Sad it doesn't install for some reason on my watch.

author: dan Bdan
comment: would like to see days divided better maybe
title: nice wear agenda

author: Andrew Barker
comment: Man, this is such a great replacement for the default Agenda app on Android Wear, it should really become the one all watches have preinstalled.

author: Paul Hargreaves
comment: On the watch and phone the first two agenda items are missing no matter how near or far in the future they are.
title: Good but...

author: Brandon Kalinowski
comment: Cannot display events from other calendars even when they are selected in the phone companion app. Good design though!

author: iamcolinedwards
comment: I like the simplicity of this app but as others have said "the layout could be better".
title: It's decent

author: Mike Dumont
comment: I like the app, but it needs the ability to show the appointments from my outlook calendar.
title: Need outlook functionality

author: Jeff Bergman
comment: Great work. Simple and to the point. Works exclnt with Asus zen watch 2.. Thank you again!!

author: Brett Thomas
comment: Fantastic,, easy to load.. brings up  basic info for appts in Google Calendar..  just what i was looking for...

author: Ken Wilson
comment: Nothing but ad's

reply.author: QHutch
reply.content: Yes there are ad's but the app is free and you only need to open the app on the phone once.

author: Graham Weir
comment: So far, does exactly what I'd hoped it would.
What a great App works flawlessly
title: Agenda wear

author: Carlos Galeano
comment: Excellent app , recommended

author: abms jon
comment: I really wish Google would let use choose the wear apps for our watches.  I've tried a lot of other wear apps that say they can do this & that, but this really hits right mark 👍. Only thing I found is a small font problem? As I use large fonts on my ZenWatch it doesn't show all the date on the left hand side. Other than that it's a simple and great wear app that simply Works👍. Well done Dev 👌.
title: Love it.  Really Adds a slash of color 😉
